sentences.english: Huge rash can cause local foreign body sensation or because of friction and cause pain.
sentences.chinese: 巨大皮疹可引起局部异物感或因摩擦而引起疼痛。

sentences.english: Main toxicities were fever and rash.
sentences.chinese: 主要毒副反应为发热和皮疹。

sentences.english: Historically, Vanilla was used to treat impotency, ulcers, hysteria and rashes.
sentences.chinese: 历史上，香草用于治疗阳痿，溃疡，歇斯底里和皮疹。

sentences.english: There is often pain, itching or tingling in the area where the rash develops.
sentences.chinese: 当皮疹发展时皮疹区域通常会有疼痛，瘙痒或麻刺感。

sentences.english: There is often pain, itching or tingling in the area where the rash develops.
sentences.chinese: 当皮疹发展时皮疹区域通常会有疼痛，瘙痒或麻刺感。

sentences.english: The skin eruption became persistent and spread to involve her whole face.
sentences.chinese: 皮疹持续不退，并播散到她的面部。

sentences.english: Her sister and my daughter Kelsey had the same rash and virus.
sentences.chinese: 她的妹妹和我的女儿凯尔西有同样的皮疹和病毒。

sentences.english: This natural remedy also helps in reducing various rashes and eczema.
sentences.chinese: 这个自然方法对减少各种皮疹和湿疹也很有效。

sentences.english: For scabies, skin rash and Insecticidal, anti-itch.
A large skin rash can cause local foreign body sensation or cause pain due to friction.
sentences.chinese: 巨大皮疹可引起局部异物感或因摩擦而引起疼痛。

sentences.english: The presence of an associated skin rash supports the likelihood of RSV infection.
sentences.chinese: 如果患者同时出现皮疹，则支持呼吸道合胞病毒感染。

sentences.english: T he adverse effects of the combination were somnolence and rash.
sentences.chinese: 联合治疗的主要副作用为嗜睡和皮疹。

sentences.english: The excitement brought her out in a nervous rash.
sentences.chinese: 激动使她全身出神经过敏的皮疹。

sentences.english: Warnings and precautions regarding the drug include cases of serious rashes.
sentences.chinese: 就药物的警告和预防措施来说会有严重的皮疹案例。

sentences.english: Rubella causes a rash and swollen glands.
sentences.chinese: 风疹引起皮疹和腺体肿胀。
